entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:12 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 07:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet snow or rain early this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 30 km/h except 70 gusting to 90 over southern sections this morning. Wind becoming light this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 06:10 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 06:10 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023
